channel.title: NPC Hits?
channel.description:
How do i change what a monster hits on me? like the amount it hits and also if it uses fire like a dragon?
any help is much appreciated ,
- Lewis.

item.title: NPC Hits?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Search “You are burnt by the fire!” in NPCHandler.java, go on from there, hitDiff = 20 is what it will hit + misc.random(30); will probably make it hit upto 20-50.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Hits?
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Lol, i got this out delta.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Hits?
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“redrover, post:3, topic:301597”]You can do something like this


} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ID && misc.random(3)==1){
if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == ShieldID || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == ShieldID || plr.ProtMage) {
plr.lowGFX(579, 0);
hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
plr.sM("You are protected from the dragon's fire!");
} else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != ShieldID && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != ShieldID) {
plr.lowGFX(579, 0);
hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
plr.sM("You are burnt by the fire!");}

Change # to anything u want him to hit, and ShieldID.[/quote]

That wouldnt work for delta , or would it? and where would i evan add it because dragons already have fire but no attacking emotes like fire , melee and such.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Hits?
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

You can do something like this


} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ID && misc.random(3)==1){
if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == ShieldID || plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] == ShieldID || plr.ProtMage) {
plr.lowGFX(579, 0);
hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
plr.sM("You are protected from the dragon's fire!");
} else if(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != ShieldID && plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerShield] != ShieldID) {
plr.lowGFX(579, 0);
hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
plr.sM("You are burnt by the fire!");}

Change # to anything u want him to hit, and ShieldID.
